name: Anam Islam
title: Transcriber
bio: I'm a Clinical Research Coordinator at Toronto General Hospital working on studies in lung transplant measuring health outcomes and quality of life in patients. I've always been passionate about bringing science stories out of the lab and into daily life. That's why I'm very excited to be joining RawTalk and working to make the episodes more accessible to our listeners. When I'm not in the lab you can catch me rolling through the Six on my bike, perfecting my biryani recipe in the kitchen, and working hard to keep my plants alive!
